content.detailedDescription:
6:30am, tuesday 5/24/16, went outside to the backyard, our view looks towards the pacific ocean(on clear days we can see san clemente island and just to the north is catalina island)... i always look out to the ocean for the view, but today saw something i had never seen before. way out on the horizon i noticed a glow on the water. at first quick glance thought it was the sun reflection as it was really bright. but that would have been impossible due to the sun's position at the time, plus it was clearly sitting on top of the water. it looked like a large stripe of light (please see photo)... my wife also saw the object. it may have been a cruise ship, but i've never seen one out there before, and on a closer look through binoculars, i'm pretty sure it wasn't. i didn't see any body of structure, just bright lights, either one large long one, or many very close together to form a strip. it didn't move. we watched it for a few mins. then i went inside while my wife stayed outside drinking her morning coffee. i came back outside about 5 mins later and it had completely vanished. wife didn't notice it leave. it was there one min, then gone.
photo is not great, camera phone. please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. would be curious to know if anyone else reported this. 
much thanks. paul.
content.summary: Sitting on the pacific ocean horizon, off the coast of carlsbad, just south of san clemente island.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a cigarette late in the afternoon and stood at the end of the driveway near the road . looked to my left and noticed a very bright object in the sky to the northwest . at first i thought it was a jet with vapour trail but it wasn't moving . i then grabbed my camera which had a x 1.8 teleconverter attached and a tripod . 
i began filming the object in hd and notified my neighbours when they arrived home , they came to see it as well . it looked like a glowing jellybean . i rang two friends while filming it . 
it moved very slowly to the west . it seemed to be glowing but the darker it got the dimmer it got . i filmed it for over 40 minutes .
content.summary: Witnessed a very bright object that didn't seem to move , grabbed my camera , filmed it for over 40 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I'm a fireman from indianapolis indiana. i have been a space junkie for years. the guys at the house call me the "space nerd" and come to me for answers to questions about physics and some basic info about how the universe works. i'm no expert by any stretch but i've watched enough h2 to be dangerous.. lol. any way. the event i'm talking about was by far one of the most unusual i've ever seen. now let me state that i have seen some interesting things during my 43 yrs, but this was pretty cool. i wish i had video but i know that you accept from time to time info without media to back the experience. so here we go. myself and a fellow firefighter were sitting out back of our fire house in indianapolis and were amazed at what we saw. we had just returned from a fire and were out back of the firehouse discussing the events that had just transpired (i'm  speaking of the fire we had just put out). while we were in the back of the firehouse. i noticed it first, then my buddy whom i have worked with for several yrs. i looked to the sky and noticed an object that was traveling in a stight line from east to west over the city. this was a very large object for its distance, but seemed to be "flickering" or "flaming" as it moved in its direction. now please understand that i've seen many "falling stars" meteorites in my 43 yrs. but the speed that this object moved was way to slow to be considered a falling star, also the trajectory was a striaght line.. horizontal. not veritacal or at an angle. the time that the object was observed was approximately 1-3min and it was captivating because of how it moved and the way that it "flamed" as it moved through the sky. meteorites tend to move quickly? this was very slow for what i've ever seen as far as travel for a meteorite. the object came into view what seemed to be out of nowhere. traveled the direction, all the time being very bright, and "flickering". also during travel time it finally went out of sight. maybe it burned out, or traveled out of sight.? i'm not sure. we have talked about this several times since it happened. because it was profound. in all my yrs of sky watching and space study, it was truly amazing to see such an event in my own backyard. darin, i love the show. i've wanted to share this event with others outside my fire dept family for a bit now. i'm watching your show as we speak actually. lol. i'm not a goof or someone who exaggerates stories, this was truly an amazing sight.. again... i wish i had video. it would've been great for the show. keep up the good work.
content.summary: This was a large object observed while at the firehouse. traveling from east to west. it seemed to be a ball of light that glowed as though it was "flaming" but moved way to slow to be considered a meteorite. it took several minutes for it to dissappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back step saw a red light in the sky. it was sitting between two stars in the northwest (nnw) portion of the sky, then it moved toward the star in the west, slowly. it had a grey circle not exactly around it but off to the side of it. this was visible at times and not at others. then it did a strange loop, a circle in the sky, then cut east and moved very fast -- faster than a plane. i went down into the yard and it was descending fast toward the horizon in the east, and then i lost it past the roofs of the houses. i told family members and they suggested it could have been a drone -- apparently they can reach 4,000 feet. this is a holiday in canada and there were fireworks going on -- i saw no fireworks and this was definitely not a firework, though someone could have sent up a drone to film fireworks. however, it seemed very high in the sky and the grey disc/circular trail attached to it i cannot explain. it moved very fast across the sky. i was surprised at how low it seemed to get without changing in size (again, could have been a drone for that reason) but i did not think drones could move that quickly.
content.summary: Small red star-sized dot in sky, faint at times, brighter at others, with a grey circle of light visible off the side of it at times.

content.detailedDescription: Dancing stars visible from my front yard in florida star like moving in circles hovering very far up all over the sky tonight lots of themits happening now
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Its still happning just came in from watching them and theyve ben there since i first observed them yesterday morning there star like very far up strait up ant there is   hundreds of them

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer doing budget numbers for work when my son called me excited to see a ufo in the sky. i leaped up on his behalf but didn't think much of it. upon viewing it seemed stationary like a satellite, yet too high for a helicopter, way too high. it was in the eastern sky, slightly south. the more i stared the more colors could be faintly detected by the naked eye. i ran and snatched my 80-200mm zoom on my dslr. this puts my focal length at 300mm because of dx crop-sensor. instantly i could detect the true shape of the object. wheel-shaped with individual lights, or circular globes, which ringed the bottom of the wheel in full circumference, throbbing a burnt orange color, but sometimes white, hard to tell, other times easy to tell when it was orange. after about 7-8 minutes of viewing the object disappear and them reappeared further north, over the san gabriel mountains when another object in identical shape and characteristics, appeared next to it...In the sky probably an inch away which means a mile or two, i'm guessing. the second object didn't last long then receded away, vanishing. then nothing in the sky. a minute later the original (i'm guessing) object reappears in the far south. we took more shaky blurred photos and i continued watching until the object receded slowly west for about ten seconds until it vanished completely.
content.summary: Object would appear, disappear, then re-appear at a different location.

content.detailedDescription: First seen with a swirling tail coming in at around a 30-35 degree angle an just stopped. seemed to hover near switchyard southwest of my location, flew north, dropped at about a 60 degree angle to the river. the lights on it where flashing red white and blue. another light on the craft seem to be on the bottom and it was a bright white flash it only flashed above the switchyard. upon touching the water the water swirled and splashed. then it took straight off up in the air, and made a random series of movements before shooting off faster than any aircraft i have ever seen. have multiple photos and video of this and several several other craft sightings in the same area. not all the graphs are the same shape summer triangle summer diamonds couple are disc shaped. no visible doors windows or entry points of any kind kama i will not be submitting photos with this request. i have submitted photos to agents before they never brought them back to me and i would like to keep my property
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fast low flying, changed directions several times, splashed the columbia river, hovered, then flew straight up.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a farm picking berries. i was looking at pictures the following day and noticed one picture with some kind of object in the upper left hand corner. can't tell what it is, but it looks unusual. did not notice it while i was taking pictures.
content.summary: Found ufo in picture, after the fact.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my flat going for a sleep just then suddenly i noticed a star shining very brightly near the moon . since its a clear sky i can diffentiate from other stars. first i thought it was a plane but than i notice that its moving in a very slow speed. than i asked my friend to confirm it . that it was a extremly bright light and its not a plane. than i thought it was a wether baloon but whn i calculated the speed n hows its look like .Its totally diffient from what i see. n actually i seeing it right now from my window n its getting brighter.. n i think i have heard a plane passing by after 15 min when i first saw it i.E may at 1:13am
content.summary: Bright yellow light moving at very slow speed say 3 meter in 1 hour

content.detailedDescription: Saw black orb at 3500 feet as i was flying by in a small 4 passenger plane. not sure if orb was floating or hovering, since plane was moving.
content.summary: Pitch black orb,

content.detailedDescription:
Turned off tv n saw beautiful crack in clouded sky out of my window like day light shining on the waters of the moray firth we have a raf base here n frequently see helicopters n jets but not at this hour and you hear them.
i was in my upstairs living room in twilight n looked at the sky as it was surreal n beautiful.
the light just switched on so i grabbed my mobile n took two pics one before n one after.
the light did not pulsate it was static no sea vessels in the area the photo is how i took it not tampered with.
ten minutes it shone the out like a light never reappeared.
it was bizarre!!
content.summary: Static in sky no sound movement nothing 10mins then gone

content.detailedDescription:
On may 21st 2016 around 11:30 pm, i took my dogs outside for their last trip before bed, i saw the red orb i have saw twice before out front,outback hovering above the tree line. ithe wasn't there for a long time, then it just disappeared, it silently hovered, moved forward, and in reverse which i found odd, because i would think a plane could go backwards, it decended somewhat at a angle slowly and quietly like a leaf falling. the whole thing lasted less then 10 seconds probably. i came in wondering what that was, my oldest dog has severe fear of thunderstorms, and panics, pants shakes, whines, hides, she began to act this way about 20 minutes or so after we came in, but we were not having rain...The next morning when i took them out, i noticed what looked like a black mark on my back yard, which actually made me mad, i was wondering who burned my yard. i went out to look at it, and it was a silvery metalic substance on my ground in a patteren, one curved arch on either side of some center pattern. 
i called my sister in nc, i sent her pictures, and i took a sample of it. her husband advised that i contact your group,  he also wanted me to let you know my husband recently has suffered from sleep paralysis,  and is a identical twin, i don't know why though????
there have been other things i find odd that have happened recently,  but never put them all together.
content.summary: Took my dogs out to potty, saw a red orb hovering the tree line, came in my dog was scared for awhile next morning saw the silvery residue and pattern

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at the hdev on iss at the above stated date/ time using my ipad 4. the object suddenly appeared from the far lower left of my screen and moved steadily ahead and to the lower left of the iss which was showing the earths surface coming towards the camera at the time.

the object was rotating slowly clockwise horizontally at the same time as it was slowly 'overtaking' the iss, all the while moving ahead on a straight path. it managed about three complete rotations prior to end of the sighting.

i saw it had three large white egg shaped additions that covered most of the upper surface of the anomolous flying object. these remained in position as if glued to the top and the whole object was rotating all together as one. i am not sure that the 'eggs' were all pointing outwards at the same angle though. one of them may have been more outwards and the other two halfway outwards 'in support' of a main one. you can judge yourselves from the images.

i was excited to see it and reacted quickly, pushing the little buttons from a cramped position slipping a little and thereby stuffing up my first attempt at image capture. i immediately precisely positioned my fingers on the minute ipad buttons and successfully managed to take the image attached just prior to nasa cutting off the signal. the whole event lasted 6-10 seconds at most.

i felt releived that i was successfull in getting evidence on this occasion because i had had a much better sighting previously which i could not capture due to me not knowing my ipad could capture images at that time! this was reported nevertheless (investigation#74568).

i have never seen an illustration of any satelite with this design but would be interested to know whether you may have. obviousely, this is a factor that will need to be checked upon in order to eliminate it as a possibility. space debris aswell..But. my feeling is that this object is so unique, so unlike anything i have seen before, even in ufo terms (in print or personal sightings) let alone human ones... i must entertain the distinct possibility that i may have captured an (another, please refer to report 74568) unusual extraterrestrial craft in close proximity to iss.

i have attached the original image along with a close up of the anomolous object.

i await your conclusions with interest.

yours sincerely
(the witness)
content.summary: Ufo appearance similar to 'a silver or grey plate with three white eggs on it' flew under and to the left of the iss

content.detailedDescription: My friend was in the jacuzzi. i was in the large pool. i was looking up at the sky as i had witnessed 4 other high altitude unknown flying objects earlier that evening. simultaneously, we both saw a very dim, high flying object. my friend and i confirmed we both were watching it flying overhead coming from the east. as we continued to watch it,  it was heading south...Then it suddenly became larger and extremely bright. it emitted a white round light. just as it quickly as it became large and bright, it changed direction back towards the east and dimmed again. i watched it as long as my eyes could possibly see it. it accelerated as it moved east. i have never witnessed such an event in regards to ufo's. i felt as though it intentionally shone bright over us as if to acknowledge "they" knew we were watching.
content.summary: Dimmed, got extremely bright, then dimmed

content.detailedDescription: Object was bright and stationary yet at a very low altitude likewise to helicopters and began to pulsate light and emit almost a fireball type of phenomenon. after parking the car and observing, witnesses observed the pulsating orb ascend slowly northeast towards what would seem to be abernathy, texas. the flight path of the object was considerably random with ascending and descending movements but what at a constant speed of about 50 knots ( maybe 70mph ), as being a avid observer of these phenomenon it was another unmistakable lubbock lights experience. the lights were red/orange and emitted a golden glow at random points and had vanished from sight within 5 minutes of the start of the observations.
content.summary: Lubbock lights orb spotted

content.detailedDescription: at about 10:45pm in tacoma, wa, i was traveling west along 74th, and coming up on s tacoma way, i crossed after the light turned green, it was about 100 meters past it i saw a bright red light over the power sub-station about 1/4 mile ahead on the left, off the road. it was a small spherical object about 8-10' in dia. it glowed a brilliant red. i saw what looked like a bolt of lightening coming into the craft, which i believe it was taking power from the transformers at the station. my car quickly died, all electronics in it too including my flashlight, cb and watch. i observed the object for about a min. when it stopped taking power, then sped off silently in a nw heading. i was coming from work that night, i work in the electronics field and had just graduated college in same area. i theorize it emanated an emp, or electro-magnetic-pulse that dampened electric fields around so nothing worked, even the traffic lights flickered. it was a very frightening experience and i kept silent of it until now. i was awed at first seeing this thing, after reading of them, it was my first ufo exp. when it left the vicinity, my car started and i left for home quite shaken i had trouble driving the last mile.
content.summary: It took power from transformer at substation, then left fast

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was first seen hovering as i drove south on wilmot rd. object was at an estimated height of 200 ft above ground. as i drove closer, i was able to get almost underneath it (~75-80 degrees from horizon). i continued driving past in order to find location to turn around, losing visual behind trees. turning around at  the nearest road and driving back to location took less than one minute. in that time, object traveled northwest a good distance, and was seen moving slowly and slightly angled (banking?). object became obscured behind trees on the side of the road and visual was lost. entire encounter took less than 2 minutes.
content.summary: Large illuminated object observed hovering at close proximity, lost due to driving, once reaquired had traveled long distance rapidly

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a light approaching the city over lake ontario, thought it was a plane coming in the light then shifted direction slightly but too quickly to be a plane, i figured it was a helicopter it then appeared to stop and  started heading south while ascending, making frequent turns and odd directional changes, started flickering and dimming and shrinking. when it started dimming i assumed it was maybe an ember from a firework (victoria day weekend) but it was far too bright originally and lasted too long to be an ember, also never descended only ascended from my perspective. it then dimmed and disappeared completely.
content.summary: Noticed a light approaching the city over lake ontario.

content.detailedDescription:
I had the night off and some friends invited me out to see their band play. the show was great, it was late, and the majority if the crowd had gone home. some friends and i sat outside under the stars to smoke cigarettes. i saw it coming very slowly, at first looking something out of doctor who or star wars. i stared at it in awe for a good 15 seconds before my brain kicked in and i realized i should point it out. at this time it had made its way directly over us, and i could see the most beautiful blue color i've ever seen forming thick circles, smaller ones around the edges. at this point the ship looked spherical, like a glass planet. i saw what looked like hundreds of observation windows. i told my friends to look up, and we all watched as it very slowly, noiselessly continued onward. when it was going, my one friend said how it looked like a shuttle, which it kind of did by the 3 very bright lights visable on it's backside. if i hadn't of looked up, it would have buzzed us and we would never have seen it. i live in the mountains near canada and have spent many years searching a light polutionless sky. i have never seen anything like this. it was comparable to having a football stadium pass right over your head, slowly and silently.
answer to 1, the waterhole, saramac lake ny
answer to 2, i always watch the sky, however it was massive and close. could almost throw a rock at it.
answer to 3, i was one awe having never seen anything remotely comparable.
answer to 4,ship looking as it came, morphing to planet looking, then ship looking once again as it continued. i was sitting on the bench against the far wall facing the building, or roughly north. it came from the left, or roughly west, and passed over us heading right, or roughly east. it was the largest, slowest, oddest and quietest thing i've ever witnessed.
answer to 5, i was in awe at first, then very eager to show others. i showed a skeptic friend first who could only mutter, "that's not a plane." his girlfriend then stated, "that looks like something out of star trek." i personally felt a little giddy and honestly, a little validated. unfortunately, they got creeper out by it and don't want to talk about it, so it still feels a bit like being the only one with no one to discuss it with. i have googled and googled, and have not been able to find a picture of what we saw. i had my phone, might of been able to catch something even with my crappy camera on account it was so close, but after a second of mental debate, i decided to instead observe all i could with my eyes while i could. sorry for that, but feel like i may have gotten a better sighting for the lack...
answer to 6, we watched it until it could no longer be seen. the whole process was about 5 minutes total.
content.summary: It was a strange shape approaching, very bright and looked like it had observation windows. when directly overhead, i could clearly see very pretty blue circles underneath. going, it looked much like a shuttle, with 3 purpoltion esk, very bright white lig

content.detailedDescription:
Mid-afternoon as i reclined in my hospital bed-at about 100 degree angle. i'm resting from a major vascular surgery 2 weeks+ prior. the time is about 3 or 4 pm and well lit outside. it's about 2 or 3 days before my discharge to go home. i'm non-sedated. outside,about 2 blocks away from my vantage point (approximately the 10th floor) in the vancouver general hospital i saw a few seagulls circling around above a small group of buildings. i was enjoying  their little "dance" when from above them i saw what i thought was another seagull drop into their midst. i instinctively expected "it" to loop-de-loop like the other seagulls-but it did not. instead, it stopped about 100 to 200 feet above the ground. it then proceeded straight to my room and stopped about a foot from outside my window-about 15 feet from me.

i recall thinking "hey,just like a pumpkin" as a "wedge or "slice" of it slid out from its left side. this object was an off-white and approximately a foot in diameter. there was no light or sound from it. it hovered firmly in the one spot with its "wedge" jutting out. the wedge had what appeared to be a lens in/on it (which seemed to be dark). last i recall was it gliding silently to my right-its left in a straight line parallel to the hospital.
the lighting outside now was night time. i thought this extremely weird, as i had the sensation that from when i first saw the orb to its departure time, not more than a minute had taken place. yet, judging  by the darkness outside a minimum of 2 or 3 hours had passed. how can that be? i was wide awake this whole time.
content.summary: First sighted orb, to its departure seemed as though less than a minute.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the con trails and noticed they all turned back to the air port  and made a perfect circuler line around the sun, so i took a photo and later looked at that and seen some weird blue moon next to the sun and the con trails were round but there was a blue moon in the photo, is that moon out at that time and why did all the air planes go back?  took the photo straight up from the ground.
content.summary: It could be a blue moon. but i dont think so jet streams are in a circle leaeving the area.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in family room watching tv. suddenly saw very bright orange, fiery object in the west sky. frequently see plane going in and out of detroit metro airport. this was nothing i have ever seen before.

went out on deck and watched object for 2-3 minutes until trees blocked sight. while watching it orange particles were falling from the bottom. had the look of molten hot metal dripping. didn't hear any sound.

it appeared to be under control and was moving what looked to be slowly. no drastic changes in course.

first thought was: what the hell is that!!!!!!


i am completely dumbfounded..
content.summary: Large fiery orange ball in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside when a large red orb was spotted overhead by my daughter.  i thought at first it might be a plane. the object then hovered and changed direction, flying in a zig-zag type pattern.  it was much too large to have been a light from a plane. it headed south and out of sight.
content.summary: Large, red orb seen over residential area

content.detailedDescription: I awake every day at 4:45 am, i walked downstairs and took my doberman outside to do her business. we live in a small town and i take my dog to a small grass area in an alleyway behind our apartment. i looked up and in the dark sky and saw what i thought was a very bright star.  very bright white light.  it was at this time i noticed it was moving from west to east. from where i was in the alley it had just appeared over my apartment.  i thought it was maybe a satellite until it appeared to stop in mid air and hover. there was no sound at all. my dog saw it and began looking up. i was confused and somewhat unnerved, so i began walking toward my back door of my apartment slowly as did my dog which was still looking in the direction of the object. as i rounded the alleyway corner the object began to move again towards the east. i watched from my door until it was gone over some buildings and out of my line of sight.  i have no idea what it was.  it was not a plane as i see them all the time with their blinking lights and it was not a helicopter as i do see them occasionally air lifting patients from our local hospital to the chattanooga area and those things make plenty of sound.
content.summary: Saw bright light moving west to east it paused, hovered and began moving again

content.detailedDescription: My parents house sits on a prominent hill overlooking woods to the west. i was going to bed around 10pm and as i got into bed i looked out my second story window to the west and noticed a saucer that was hovering near the top of the tree line. it was hovering above the smaller trees, but level with the canopy of a large oak tree. the saucer shaped object had a dull whitish body and a glowing dome on top. from my distance i estimated the object to be roughly 10-15 feet in size (rather small). a transparent beam (i could see the top and bottom of it) was projecting from the middle of the saucer and ending into the trunk of a large oak tree (approximately 100 year old tree). round spheres of light were moving along the inside of the beam, and being shot into the tree trunk. the balls were continuous, one after another. after watching in amazement for about a minute i ran to the upstairs balcony and yelled to my dad. he immediately ran upstairs and i brought him to the window to show him but the object was gone. my dad said "ok, go to bed!"
content.summary: Looking out window from bed and saw white saucer with glowing dome emmiting laser with glowing balls moving inside the laser and shot into tree

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter took my cell  phone and went to a balcony that is behind my house. she took some pictures and when she gave me the cell back i checked the photos and noticed the strange object in the photo i am attaching
i would like to get picture analyzed
content.summary: Photo taken by my 7 years old daughter

content.detailedDescription:
was walking to my house at about 11 pm from my office building when i noticed the round orange/yellow glowing and flickering lights at 20 degrees behind the trees traveling at a western direction and ascending at about 25 degrees. they then seemed to rapidly fade out when they were at about 40 degrees to my vision or possibly traveled into the low clouds. their travel speed was constant as if following a wind. i could not seem to focus my binoculars on them and they looked fuzzy.

 my reaction was they might be big balloons with lights in them.

 summery;
 i saw 3 groups of 5 to 7 orange/yellow flickering balls of lights in each group pass in one direction, as they ascended in a straight path they faded out.
 no noise. had no camera handy- was mesmerized.
 my wife came out and saw them as well.
content.summary: 3 groups of 5-7 orange/yellow round lights ascending in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My friend was leaving my house at 9:05 pm on may 21st in scottsdale, az. he came running back in to tell me to come outside because there was something i had to see. as i stepped outside i looked n/nw and saw a swarm of about 12 glowing objects in the sky moving from northest to northeast.  i live right along the flight path for landing at phx airport and these were farther away than the path planes normally take and moving much faster. not to mention they were in a swarm and also changing altitude rapidly whilst moving from nw to ne. entire event lasted about a minute. my first instinct after the initial shock was to take a video with my iphone. however the street lights around my house made it really hard to focus so i had to settle for a picture. by the time the picture was taken all but two lights and disappeared and they can be see left center with a red hue.
content.summary: Spotted a swarm of about 12 ufo's over north phoenix/scottsdale

content.detailedDescription: This is my first time reporting anything where i live is at an old farm house and a big corn field lay behind my house my family and i have witnessed possible alien crafts hovering over the local corn fields on the night of friday may 20, 2016 and their were lots of military jets chasing the crafts. later that night while searching the corn field with flash lights weird tracks were found in the dirt in the field and an unknown entity =was spotted running away when chased by a family member. i also saw a craft hover over the neighbors cow field with cows, and shot a beam down directly where the cows were, this all happen within about 15 seconds. i have seen things before at this location like grey aliens and crafts land in the field behind my house and other strange events  hope to hear back from you to talk more about the sighting and the past sightings thank you.
content.summary: Looked like mother-ship  with smaller ships leaving the craft and possible entity spoted in the dark

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, first of all this event was a purely actual event happened in sunlight day. and now i believe that yes, something is happening on earth.
i was in my room of a paying guest flat, 5th floor, and was about to go for my bath and then i suddenly noticed from my window an object glowing/flashing over a jungle area more than 1 km away from my apartment.At first, i thought it was a bird with white wings which brightens because of sunlight reflection.
but then the object starts to brightens more and shapes itself in a sphere(a small glowing dot from my distance).Then after that it starts moving in an awkward path of a one and a half wave pattern and suddenly takes an unexpected 80 degree upward turn towards the sky.
i was fully stunt by the scene i was watching as it was totally unexpected and extraordinary. i reacted to it with very high expressions.I ran to the window of next room to see a better view but then it vanished in the sky(not into the sky) like anything and that's when i lost sight of the object.
after the sighting i strongly claimed that it was not an earth object or any earth technology as the things the object did is not explainable.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was hovering like anything and then took an awkward turn.
